gtag-config-analyticsid: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgGTagAnalyticsId. This message is not exposed to users.
gtag-config-anonymizeip: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgGTagAnonymizeIP. This message is not exposed to users.
gtag-config-honordnt: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgGTagHonorDNT. This message is not exposed to users.
gtag-config-tracksensitivepages: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgGTagTrackSensitivePages. This message is not exposed to users.
